description: This file contains React components for rendering various types of charts (Line, Bar, Pie) using the 'recharts' library, with a focus on a minimalist theme and customizable options.

methods.name: TrendLineChart({ data, dataKey = "value", xKey = "date", color = "#374151", gradient = false, height = 220 })
methods.description: A React component rendering a minimalist trend line or area chart, with optional gradient fill.

methods.name: StackedBarChart({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true })
methods.description: A React component rendering a stacked bar chart to visualize costs or other metrics across categories.

methods.name: PieBreakdownChart({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })
methods.description: A React component rendering a pie chart to display category share breakdowns.

ctags.name: PieBreakdownChart

ctags.signature: ({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })

ctags.signature: ({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true })
